otanalysis.tests package

Submodules

otanalysis.tests.test_controller module

change a line in the misc.py file from imp import reload by from importlib import reload

to eliminate this warning: “DeprecationWarning: the imp module is deprecated in favour of importlib;”

file path: ~/anaconda3/lib/python3.9/site-packages/past/builtins/misc.py

class otanalysis.tests.test_controller.TestController[source]

Bases: object

Test class of the controller for the application of processing of the optical tweezers curves

classmethod setup_class()[source]

This function is launched at each test to create the Controller object and do the repetitive tasks before launching the test

classmethod teardown_class()[source]

This function is run at the end of each test to destroy all the elements created in the setup_class()

test_create_list_files()[source]

Test that the create_list_files() function of the controller returns a list of files to analyze

test_incomplete_file()[source]

Test the completeness of a curve file

test_length_dict_curve()[source]

Test that the length of the dictionary of curves of the controller after analysis is not empty

test_output(tmpdir)[source]

Test the output of the output file temporarily

Parameters
tmpdir: object

allows you to create a temporary repository
